title.narrative: Technical Assistance for Revenue Administration and Revenue Policy - Cote d'Ivoire

description.narrative: OTA is assisting the Direction Gnrale des Impts in identifying risks and creating mitigations as part of a Compliance Improvement Plan; developing the expertise and capacity to effectively audit specialty sectors such as banks, telecommunications, and the cocoa industry; applying international taxation best practices in ensuring compliance of multinational companies regarding exchange of information, proper application of transfer pricing routines, and related compliance activities; improving the efficiency and fairness of the tax dispute resolution process.
